name: Crazy Cat Art
description:
Scratch Art

You can make Scratch the Cat   SUFFER!!

By shrinking him and enlarging him way too many times for comfort!!

:)

Instructions

They are already in the game but if you cant understand text on a game here are the instructions.

Press (or hold) the up arrow to enlarge Scratch The Cat

Press (or hold) the down arrow to shrink Scratch The Cat

Press A and Scratch will speak words of wisdom

Press Space to clear the canvas (or screen)

:))

Credits

All code by me and everything is made by me

I definitely made Scratch The Cat.

:)))
